snippet: SCHUMACHER--Katherine W.,passed away at her home peacefully on May 31, 2016 with her husband by her side. She was also the wife of the late Arthur Ware who passed away in 1978. Katherine was a longtime volunteer at the Metropolitan Museum of Art. She is survived by her husband Richard and his sons Richard Schumacher, Gary Channing, and niece Janet Gutyan. Friends may call Frank E. Campbell Funeral Chapel, 1076 Madison Ave. at 81st St., NYC, NY 10028 Monday from 1pm-3pm and 6pm-8pm. Memorial Service will be held at Holy Trinity Church at a later date. 1/3

Friends may call Frank E. Campbell Funeral Chapel, 1076 Madison Ave. at 81st St., NYC, NY 10028 Monday from 1pm-3pm and 6pm-8pm. Memorial Service will be held at Holy Trinity Church at a later date. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  SCHUMACHER, KATHERINE W.
